import React, { Component } from 'react' import Stepper from '@/components/stepper' import WrapComponents from '@/components/wrapper' import { Radio } from '@/components/radio' import { ColoredButtons, TransparentButtons } from '@/components/button' import { SmallHeading } from '@/components/headings/index' import ConnectComponent from '../../../connect' import { Checkbox } from '@/components/checkBox/index' import { UploadContent } from '@/actions/utils' class StepTwo extends Component { state = { steps: ['Channel', 'Message', 'Scheduling', 'Segmentation', 'Overview & Send'], message: '', title: '', advance: false, buttons: false, background: false, foreground: false, FgImageUpload: true, FgImageUrl: false, ImageUpload: true, ImageUrl: false, upload: false, userFilePath: '', } handleFileChange = async e => { const { files } = e.target if (files.length == 1) { const res = await UploadContent(files[0], 'media') if (res) { this.setState({ userFilePath: res.s3url, upload: true, }) } } } render() { const { steps, message, title, advance, button, background, ImageUrl, ImageUpload, foreground, FgImageUpload, FgImageUrl, } = this.state return (
Title* // this.handleInputFields('title', e.currentTarget.value) // } /> Message* // this.handleInputFields('message', e.currentTarget.value) // } />
